00015 BaseMappingIIProcessor::BaseMappingIIProcessor(const string& typeName)
00016   : Processor(typeName),
00017     _moduleTypeChange(this,&BaseMappingIIProcessor::moduleTypeChanged),
00018     _moduleLocationChange(this,&BaseMappingIIProcessor::moduleLocationChanged),
00019     _moduleConnectionChange(this,&BaseMappingIIProcessor::moduleConnectionChanged),
00020     _detectorTransformationChange(this,&BaseMappingIIProcessor::detectorTransformationChanged),
00021     _referenceTransformationChange(this,&BaseMappingIIProcessor::referenceTransformationChanged)
00022 {
00023   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"*** BaseMappingII:"<< _processorName <<" constructor called"<< endl;
00024   _description = "Base processor to handle alignment and mapping information, to be specialized for specific detectors.";
00025 
00026   registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName", "Name of the input collection",
00027                              _inputColName, string("InputHits"));
00028 
00029   registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", "Name of the output collection",
00030                              _outputColName, string("CalorimeterHits"));
00031 
00032   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleConnectionCollectionName", 
00033                              "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the connection between modules and the DAQ front-ends",
00034                              _colNameModuleConnection,
00035                              string("ModuleConnection"));
00036 
00037   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleLocationCollectionName", 
00038                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_location)",
00039                              _colNameModuleLocation,
00040                              string("ModuleLocation"));
00041 
00042   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleDescriptionCollectionName", 
00043                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_description)",
00044                              _colNameModuleDescription,
00045                              string("ModuleDescription"));
00046 
00047   registerProcessorParameter("DetectorTransformationCollectionName", 
00048                              "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the detetcor transformation",
00049                              _colNameDetectorTransformation,
00050                              string("DetectorTransformation"));
00051 
00052   registerProcessorParameter( "ReferenceTransformationCollectionName" ,
00053                               "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the position and rotation of the reference coordinate system (folder e.g. /Calice/ECAL/Transformation)",
00054                               _colNameReferenceTransformation,
00055                               string("ReferenceTransformation") );
00056 
00057 }

00059 
00060 void BaseMappingIIProcessor::init() {
00061 
00062   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"*** BaseMappingII: init() called"<< endl;
00063   printParameters();
00064 
00065   stringstream message;
00066   message << _processorName <<" "<< name() << ": undefined conditions data: ";
00067   bool error = false;
00068   try {
00069     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleLocationChange,_colNameModuleLocation)) {
00070       message << " " << _colNameModuleLocation;
00071       error=true;
00072     }
00073 
00074     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleConnectionChange, _colNameModuleConnection)) {
00075       message << " " << _colNameModuleConnection;
00076       error=true;
00077     }
00078 
00079     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleTypeChange, _colNameModuleDescription) ) {
00080       message << " " << _colNameModuleDescription;
00081       error=true;
00082     }
00083 
00084     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_detectorTransformationChange, _colNameDetectorTransformation) ) {
00085       message << " " << _colNameDetectorTransformation;
00086       error=true;
00087     }
00088 
00089   }
00090   catch (ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler &conddata_error) {
00091     // --- catch conditions data handler registration errors
00092     //   ... and build a combined error message.
00093     string a(conddata_error.what());
00094     error = true;
00095     if (a.size()>0) {
00096       a.erase(a.size()-1);
00097       message << a; 
00098     }
00099   }
00100   // FIXME: shouldn't this be moved inside the try block above?
00101   if(error) {
00102     message <<  ".";
00103     throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00104   }
00105   _mapping.init();
00106   _mapping.setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00107   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"*** BaseMappingII: init() done!"<< endl;
00108 }

00126 void BaseMappingIIProcessor::updateInverseMap() {
00127   _inverseModuleMap.clear();
00128   for (unsigned ilocation=0; ilocation<_mapping.getNModules(); ++ilocation) {
00129     int modID = _mapping.getModuleID(ilocation);
00130     _inverseModuleMap[ modID ] = ilocation;
00131   }
00132 }
